Header.title: Hire or be hired online let Joblinxs link you up
Header.paragraph: Next generation freelance platformLoved by thousands of 5-Star-Rated employers, leading brands, and service providers.

About.paragraph: The app is designed to fully automate the hiring process into a seamless system. The automation of a hiring process into a seamless system is beneficial to both service seekers and service providers in the following ways.
Why: Joblinxs App enables service seekers to keep track of their Applicants
The Joblinxs App helps service seekers to manage the hiring Plan
Service seekers save time by concentrating on personal touches
Joblinxs App promotes paster palent engagement
Joblinxs App supports more equal and fair hiring practices
With The Joblinxs App, fewer items fall between the cracks

AboutUs.paragraph: Joblinxs is a marketplace and employment app, whose main objective is to match service providers with service seekers in a way that is easy and mutually beneficial for everyone involved. The service seeker can search the service provider’s profile, post as many jobs as they can, in many locations, send messages to those they are willing to hire, chat with them, book video call sessions, organize interviews, send orders, confirm orders, set reminders, track  the  locations  of  the service  providers,  make  posts  for  emergency  jobs,  book replacements,  confirm  the  beginning  and  end  of  a  project,  confirm  the  start  of  a  shift, confirm the end of a shift, confirm working hours, pay service providers, collect refunds, post  reviews,  award  endorsements,  open  disputes,  include  additional  job  categories which will be confirmed by the admin, refer friends and family, and contact admin.

Features.heading: 24/7 Customer Service Access
Features.text: Contact our Customer Service team 24 hours per day, 7 days per week.

Features.heading: User Friendly
Features.text: Signing up and Logging into the Joblinxs app is quick and easy for a user-friendly experience.

Features.heading: Push Notifications
Features.text: Push Notifications are available to keep all users informed throughout the entire hiring process.

Features.heading: Track Locations
Features.text: Know where your service provider is at all times! Track his/ her location prior to the start of the shift.

Features.heading: Referral Fees
Features.text: Refer friends and family and get paid! Joblinxs values your business and will provide incentives to show it.

Features.heading: Instant Messaging
Features.text: Send instant messages to Service Providers to connect with them for work. Push notifications will allow instant notice and foster immediate responses.

Portfolio.paragraph: “People who succeed in business aren't afraid to hear feedback from their customers - they actually thrive from it.”

Works.title: Create Account
Works.text: Create your account following simple steps by providing the required information.

Works.title: Apply to Job / Get Hired
Works.text: Apply to variety of jobs that suits your expertise and skills.

Works.title: Get Paid
Works.text: Complete the jobs, get paid, and transfer balance to your attached accounts.
